tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
    employee_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_value DECIMAL,
    measurement_date DATE,
    goal_setting TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    metric_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    measurement_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY(employee_id, metric_name, measurement_date)
);

CREATE TABLE goals_data (
    goal_id INT NOT NULL,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    goal_description TEXT,
    target_date DATE,
    is_achieved BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY(goal_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES performance_metrics(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE KPIs (
    kpi_id INT,
    kpi_name VARCHAR(50),
    target_value FLOAT,
    current_value FLOAT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceManagement (
    review_id INT,
    employee_id INT,
    reviewer_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  metric_value DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  measurement_date DATE NOT NULL
);
